## Events

| Event    | Description                                                       | Type                  |
| -------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `close`  | An event that fires on clicking on close button of search overlay | `CustomEvent<void>`   |
| `search` | An event that fires on search value change.                       | `CustomEvent<string>` |
